feature_1.description: Beliefs in ancient myths and artifacts.
feature_1.reasoning: Both films heavily rely on characters' beliefs in ancient myths and artifacts, driving their motivations and actions.

feature_2.reasoning: Both films feature characters whose motivations are deeply tied to acquiring powerful artifacts for personal and ideological reasons.

feature_3.description: Social dynamics involving alliances and conflicts.
feature_3.reasoning: Both films exhibit complex social dynamics with shifting alliances, betrayals, and a mix of old and new world characters.

feature_4.reasoning: Both films adhere to a traditional adventure narrative arc with supernatural elements, leading to similar storytelling structures.
